Package model

Class CityMap

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.CityMap
public class CityMap extends Observable
Represents a city map with intersections, road segments, and delivery requests.
Author:
H4114

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CityMap()
    Default constructor for creating a city map.
    CityMap(HashMap<Long,Intersection> listIntersections, List<RoadSegment> listRoadSegments)
    Constructor for creating a city map with existing intersections and road segments.

    • addIntersection

      public void addIntersection(Long idIntersection, double latitude, double longitude) throws ExceptionXML
      Adds an intersection to the city map with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      idIntersection - The unique identifier of the intersection.
      latitude - The latitude of the intersection.
      longitude - The longitude of the intersection.
      Throws:
      ExceptionXML - If there's an issue with XML.

    • addDeliveryRequest

      public void addDeliveryRequest(int index, Long idIntersection, double latitude, double longitude, int timeWindow) throws ExceptionXML
      Adds a delivery request to the city map at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index where the delivery request should be added.
      idIntersection - The unique identifier of the delivery request.
      latitude - The latitude of the delivery request.
      longitude - The longitude of the delivery request.
      timeWindow - The time window of the delivery request.
      Throws:
      ExceptionXML - If there's an issue with XML.

    • addDeliveryRequest

      public void addDeliveryRequest(Long idIntersection, double latitude, double longitude, int timeWindow) throws ExceptionXML

    • addDeliveryRequest

      public void addDeliveryRequest(int index, Long idIntersection, double latitude, double longitude, int timeWindow, LocalTime departureTime, LocalTime arrivalTime) throws ExceptionXML
      Adds a delivery request to the city map at a specific index with specified departure and arrival times.
      Parameters:
      index - The index where the delivery request should be added.
      idIntersection - The unique identifier of the delivery request.
      latitude - The latitude of the delivery request.
      longitude - The longitude of the delivery request.
      timeWindow - The time window of the delivery request.
      departureTime - The departure time of the delivery request.
      arrivalTime - The arrival time of the delivery request.
      Throws:
      ExceptionXML - If there's an issue with XML.

    • removeDeliveryRequest

      public void removeDeliveryRequest(int position)
      Removes a delivery request from the list of delivery requests.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the delivery request to be removed.

    • addRoadSegment

      public void addRoadSegment(String streetName, Intersection startingIntersection, Intersection endingIntersection, double length)
      Adds a road segment to the city map.
      Parameters:
      streetName - The name of the road segment.
      startingIntersection - The starting intersection of the road segment.
      endingIntersection - The ending intersection of the road segment.
      length - The length of the road segment.

    • getAtPoint

      public void getAtPoint(Point p, Point focus, double coefX, double coefY, int sideLength)
      Gets the intersection at a specified point in the city map.
      Parameters:
      p - The point to check.
      focus - The focus point.
      coefX - The coefficient for the x-coordinate.
      coefY - The coefficient for the y-coordinate.
      sideLength - The side length.

    • findCorrespondingRoadSegment

      public RoadSegment findCorrespondingRoadSegment(Intersection startingIntersection, Intersection endingIntersection)
      Finds the corresponding road segment on the city map.
      Parameters:
      startingIntersection - The starting intersection of the road segment to find.
      endingIntersection - The ending intersection of the road segment to find.
      Returns:
      The found road segment, null otherwise.
